steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Hey...you look lost.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I remember that look, the way my eyes darted around at the bobbing heads in front of me.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: The way my steps dragged, like I was walking just to keep moving...

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Remind me, where have you been?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: Tell me of your journey so far. Paste your resume/CV as text

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Ah, yes...you've travelled far.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: You must be tired. How many hours each day do you spend moving?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: How many hours a day do you spend being 'productive'?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Ah...

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: ...bet you feel like you got a bit stuck along the way.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Remember these people? Those who took the same path as you, but have travelled much further.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Person 1 Resume Placeholder

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Person 2 Resume Placeholder

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Well, you can't walk any faster.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: But, I'm curious, where are you going anyway?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: What's your current biggest career goal?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: No, no, no. Forget the expected destinations, the well-worn paths, the milestones others have marked.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'm talking about the very end. Your final breath. The room around your deathbed.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: What do you see?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Who's there?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: What matters then?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: What are you desperately wishing you had done differently?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: You're taking your final breaths. What's on your mind?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Now strip away the noise, the rumble of footsteps around you, the pounding of your heart as you struggle to catch up to the shoulders brushing past you.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: When were you most alive? When did time disappear because you were so absorbed in something that mattered?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Before the world told you what your journey should look like?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: What makes you feel most alive, most like yourself?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I see you clearly now.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: You are:

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Trait 1 Placeholder

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Trait 2 Placeholder

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Trait 3 Placeholder

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Well, if you keep going straight, you'll probably end up here.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Your Future Resume (10 Years From Now)

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: But if you come with me, we can go to a place like this, somewhere that honours who you really are.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Your Values-Aligned Future Resume (10 Years From Now)

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: So, my old friend.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Which path are you going to take?

steps.speaker: user
steps.text: Which path calls to your soul?

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Brave choice. The path less traveled always requires a guide who knows the way.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'll need some time to plan our journey.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'll map out a clear route from where we are now to our destination.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: We'll use landmarks along the way to keep us on track.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'll share the wisdom of those who've already walked these paths, so you may take the easiest routes to each landmark.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'll always keep a map for you, showing both what's ahead, and how far we've already come.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: And when the old voices return, the ones telling you to measure, to compare, to optimise...

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: ...come find me.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: I'll remind you who we really are, and show you other paths that honor your authentic self.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: [Show video]

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: Remember, it's not about how fast you walk.

steps.speaker: bot
steps.text: It's about where you are going.

steps.speaker: system
steps.text: replay
